scripts.install: (cd api && npm install); (cd app && npm install)
scripts.dump-db: sudo tar -cf database_public.tar api/public && docker exec postgres pg_dump -U cinevoraces cinevoraces -F t -f /database.tar && docker cp postgres:/database.tar ./
scripts.restore-db: docker cp ./database.tar postgres:/database.tar && docker exec -i postgres pg_restore -U cinevoraces -d cinevoraces -F t /database.tar && docker exec -i postgres rm ./database.tar && tar xf ./database_public.tar
scripts.rebuild-test: docker rm -f app && npm run build-test && docker exec app npm run build && docker-compose -f prod-test.yml restart
scripts.rebuild: docker rm -f app && docker volume rm cinevoraces_next && npm run build && npm run build-app && docker exec app npm run build && docker-compose restart
